Vice
programme.desc: Prepare for serious thrills as a cop pursues a female android that escaped from a hedonistic resort where people live out their wildest fantasies. Meanwhile, the owner of the resort dispatches a band of mercenaries to eliminate the android first.

programme.title: Envy
programme.desc: Here's a true Black comedy. That's because it stars Jack Black. He's a blast as a suddenly successful entrepreneur whose best friend and neighbor (Ben Stiller) resents his buddy's good fortune and rues the fact that he blew the opportunity to join him in his wildly lucrative venture. Christopher Walken excels as a barroom philosopher who imparts some dubious advice to Stiller. Barry Levinson directed. Rachel Weisz, Amy Poehler.

programme.title: Good Boys
programme.desc: One day, 12-year-old Max gets invited by the cool kids to a kissing party. Panicked because he doesn't know how to kiss, he enlists the help of two of his friends, Thor and Lucas, to help him uncover the mystery of kissing. After online research proves to be unproductive, they decide to take the drone owned by Max's father in order to spy on the neighboring teens. When the drone unexpectedly crashes, the boys are thrust into an adventure.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: A talented journalist unexpectedly bumps into his former babysitter who is now running for the presidency. Feeling a deep connection, she hires him to be her speechwriter and a romantic relationship develops between the two, despite being totally unprepared for her high profile lifestyle.

programme.title: Six Days, Seven Nights
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Anne Heche plays an ambitious magazine editor who becomes marooned on a deserted island with a gruff cargo pilot (Harrison Ford). Despite their conflicting personalities, the two castaways gradually fall for one another, even as they are besieged by mother nature and ruthless modern-day pirates. David Schwimmer, Jacqueline Obradors, Temuerra Morrison, Allison Janney.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this terrifying gothic romance, a mysterious stranger woos a young woman and brings her to his mansion atop a clay mountain. There, she learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets as she fights for her sanity and her very life.

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: A tarnished New York cop and his younger partner run afoul of the Japanese Yakuza after escorting a crime boss to Osaka in order to stand trial.

programme.title: Hitchcock
programme.desc: This exquisite biographical drama explores the relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma during the production of the classic 1960 film "Psycho.".

programme.title: Her Smell
programme.desc: A fading '90s punk rocker struggles with life after the past success of her all-female grunge band. Now playing smaller venues and competing against her own sobriety and the pressures of motherhood, she takes a hiatus from the stage, to find herself and her sober creativity.

programme.title: John Q
programme.desc: Riveting thriller about a family man whose son needs a lifesaving heart-transplant operation. When his health-care plan doesn't cover the boy's medical procedure, he takes drastic steps to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: This dazzling, futuristic sci-fi thriller follows Greer, an FBI agent investigating a murder in a world where people no longer go outside but instead live life through robotic surrogates controlled from their homes. As Greer amasses clues, he uncovers a conspiracy involving the people responsible for creating the surrogates.

programme.title: Half Nelson
programme.desc: This poignant and moving two-character study is set in a poor Brooklyn neighborhood where a junior-high student (Shareeka Epps) catches her dedicated and inspiring teacher (Ryan Gosling) getting high. Surprisingly, the two begin a tentative friendship that could lead to each other's salvation. Newcomer Epps earns an A-plus for an impressively restrained performance, and Gosling is also excellent. Directed by Ryan Fleck, who co-wrote the script with Anna Boden. Anthony Mackie.

programme.title: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: Entombed for 200 years after betraying a witch, 18th-century vampire Barnabas Collins returns to his mansion in 1972, only to find his estate in ruins and his family plagued by macabre secrets in this deliciously gothic remake of the classic TV series.

programme.title: The Return
programme.desc: Sarah Michelle Gellar ("Scream 2," "The Grudge," "The Grudge 2") adds to her image as Hollywood's reigning scream queen with this supernatural frightfest. She plays a Midwestern saleswoman being drawn back to the scene of a brutal murder that occurred in Texas 15 years earlier. Directed by Asif Kapadia. Sam Shepard, Adam Scott, Darrian McClanahan, Frank Ertl, J.C. MacKenzie, Peter O'Brien, Kate Beahan.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A strikingly beautiful woman unleashes her strength and skills in order to become one of the best government assassins in the world. Later, she is recruited by the CIA to kill KGB's head in exchanged for immediate retirement and lifetime protection.

programme.title: Wedding Daze
programme.desc: A man decides to propose to a complete stranger on a whim in this hilarious farce starring Jason Biggs ("American Pie") and Isla Fisher ("Wedding Crashers"). Michael Weston, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joe Pantoliano, Heather Goldenhersh. Written and directed by Michael Ian Black.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: In this high-flying comedy, Uma Thurman gives a superb performance as a shrewish, possessive superhero who gets dumped by her regular-Joe boyfriend (Luke Wilson), and then decides to use her superpowers to exact revenge on him and his new love (Anna Faris). In a hilarious nod to "Fatal Attraction," Thurman substitutes live great-white-shark sushi for the boiled bunny. Directed by Ivan Reitman and written by Don Payne, who has scripted episodes of "The Simpsons.".

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Bound to stir up good and bad memories of an adolescent rite of passage, director Rawson Marshall Thurber's outrageous nerds-vs.-jocks comedy pits a misfit dodgeball team against a squad sponsored by a corporate giant. Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn, Christine Taylor, Rip Torn, Stephen Root, Gary Cole, Jason Bateman, Justin Long, Joel David Moore, Alan Tudyk, Chris Williams.

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: Hapless, hopeless and frenetically bumbling Inspector Jacques Clouseau rides again in this priceless gem about a murder investigation involving a famous soccer coach and the search for a one-of-a-kind diamond called the "Pink Panther.".

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: Hollywood's next generation takes center stage as Colin Hanks (son of Tom) stars in this comedy from director Jake Kasdan (son of Lawrence). It's the story of a California high-school senior (Hanks) who jumps through hoops to get into Stanford after a mishap with his transcript. Schuyler Fisk, Jack Black, Catherine O'Hara, John Lithgow, Lily Tomlin, Chevy Chase.

programme.title: Lost Boys: The Tribe
programme.desc: A vampire hunter is called in after a surfer and his sister tangle with a tribe of bloodsuckers. Corey Feldman reprises his signature role of Edgar Frog in this thrilling follow-up of the 1987 cult favorite. Tad Hilgenbrinck, Angus Sutherland, Autumn Reeser, Jamison Newlander, Corey Haim. Directed by P.J. Pesce.

programme.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
programme.desc: Fantasy about a housewife and her movie hero, who walks off the silver screen and into her gray life. They begin a romance as she shows him around her world and he takes her into his.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: A dog named Enzo wants to be reincarnated into a human.The dog reflects on his life and relationship with a Formula One race car driver who understands that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate everyday life.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also A Star
programme.desc: A girl living in New York City has less than 24 hours before her family is deported back to Jamaica. During this difficult time, she unexpectedly and instantly falls in love with a Korean-American boy, and they try to defy the odds to be together in a universe that is keeping them apart.

programme.title: The Watch
programme.desc: Four suburbanites stumble upon an alien invasion while volunteering as a neighborhood-watch group, and they fight to protect their block from evil extraterrestrials in this madcap sci-fi comedy.

programme.title: Shaft

But it's a clash of style and identity in this action comedy film about settling scores.

Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett, James Coburn.
